On Sep 25, 2009, at 4:52 AM, Sam Johnston wrote:

> Apologies for the top post but Yahoo's message mangling is just too  
> annoying...
>
>

There is a way to turn this behavior off for yourself. Go to http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/rest-discuss/join 
  (after login), and then choose "Traditional" under "Step 3: Message  
Preference" at the bottom of the page.

HTH.

Subbu
